about_the_game:
The Reinforcement Pack features additional content for SKALD: Against the Black Priory and is also bundled in the Deluxe Edition. It includes the following…

  • A pack of In-Game portraits
  • 5 New Die Skins to roll with animations
  • 3 unique backgrounds with additional stats
  • 2 wallpapers
  • Two High Resolution versions of the game's hand-drawn overland map
  • Additional Vendor: Malachai the Magical Item Merchant - A vendor that sells a handful of unique magical items, available from the Refugee’s Camp and beyond.

*Malachai the Magical Item Merchant can be found further into the game at the Refugee’s Camp
*Please note - We are aware of an issue that Malachai the Magical Item Merchant may not spawn into an ongoing run if you choose to upgrade from standard to deluxe. This will not affect new save files.
